=====================================================

Toad Monster [3D Model]   User Guide <Ver 1.6>

=====================================================

Update info

-----------------------------------------------

ADD 2 Animations! [Walk][Stun].


Add Origin 3D Max file.


You can make your another origin animation!!


-----------------------------------------





You are the one who brings me dream.

I am so much obliged to you for your kindness.

I'll keep on trying my best.!!

Have a good Day!!













asset info

-----------------------------------------------------
models
-----------------------------------------------------

> 1594  tris
   
> 866   verts

> bipe set up

----------------------------------------------------
Includes 8 Animations
----------------------------------------------------


> Idle

> Walk

> Run

> Attack

> Attack01

> Damage

> Stun

> Dead

===================================================


=================================================== 

instructions

===================================================


1.click to the  [File] > [Open Project] > [Toad Demo] folder

2.Dubble click [Demo_scene]

3.you can use the model file ~  Too easy~~~



Enjoy!! Cool Guys!!
